de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.exporter

Class FileExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.common.AbstractPlugin
      • de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.exporter.AbstractExporter
        • de.opendiabetes.vault.plugin.exporter.FileExporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpenDiabetesPlugin, Exporter, org.pf4j.ExtensionPoint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVFileExporter, MLExporter, OdvDbJsonExporter.OdvDbJsonExporterImplementation

    public abstract class FileExporter
extends AbstractExporter
    This class defines the default structure how data gets exported to a file.

                     throws java.io.IOException
        Exports the data to a file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - File path where the data should be exported to.
        data - The data to export.
        Returns:
        The return code as specified in Exporter.ReturnCode.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there was an error exporting the data

      • loadPluginSpecificConfiguration

        public boolean loadPluginSpecificConfiguration(java.util.Properties configuration)
        Most generic loading of configurations of exporter plugins. They usually have the following three properties:
        • isPeriodRestricted - Indicates whether the data that is to be exported shall be filtered by a time period.
          Naturally requires that the dates are set accordingly
        • isPeriodRestrictedFrom - The start date of the date restriction, expected date format is dd/MM/yyyy
        • isPeriodRestrictedTo - The end date of the date restriction, expected date format is dd/MM/yyyy
        If it is necessary to set special properties for any given plugin this may be done within the plugins actual implementation.
        Specified by:
        loadPluginSpecificConfiguration in class AbstractPlugin
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration to be set.
        Returns:
        True if the configuration could be set successfully, false otherwise.
